column1: Local Foods////When I stepped in Local Foods for a Tuesday lunch
column2: the atmosphere and design of the restaurant amazed me. The decor was modern
column4: and it felt so welcoming. Menu was simple as well
column5: not like complicated ones that gives you 1000 options to choose from. Sandwich + 2 sides or cup of soup
column6: easy. I went ahead and ordered the crunchy chicken sandwich with a cup of the chicken posole.
